resources:
MyPlaces Map
Access to the location service is required to demonstrate the \'my location\' feature, which shows your current location on the map. This sample requires location permission to enable the \'my location\' layer. Please try again and grant access to use the location.\nIf the permission has been permanently denied, it can be enabled from the System Settings > Apps > \'Goole Maps Testy UTE\'. Location permission is required for this demo. <<<<<<< HEAD Refresh ======= >>>>>>> 46934a180301248c43a2d600e5a9b7fb1d845f05
